preferences.name: baseUrl

preferences.description: Base Url to open tabs with Ids. For example : https://example.com/id=

commands.name: concatenateIds
commands.title: Concatenate Ids
commands.description:
Contatenate Ids for SOQL Research

Ex: 123 456 
789 

=> ('123','456','789')

commands.name: openMultipleTabs
commands.title: Open Multiple links
commands.description:
Paste a list of Ids and open multiples links in browser. 

Ex : 123 456

=> Open https://test.com/123 and https://test.com/456
